attributes.action: Limit foreign ownership in the UK in line with ownership rights of British people in foreign countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many countries limit the rights of foreigners to own businesses or homes. In some countries British people aren’t allowed to own land. This can cause difficulties for British investors and home buyers abroad.

The United States has enacted reciprocal treaties, such as the US-Thailand Amity treaty, which bring their citizens rights in Thailand into line with those of the people of Thailand. The British government should seek to enact such treaties.

If other countries are not willing to enter into reciprocal agreements with the UK the government should limit the rights of their citizens in line with restrictions for our citizens in their countries.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
